state.output:
<file>
00001| // IMPORTANT: When adding new env variables to the codebase, update this array
00002| export const ENV_VARIABLES: EnvVariable[] = [
00003|   {
00004|     name: "DASHSCOPE_API_KEY",
00005|     description: "Alibaba Cloud DashScope API key for Qwen model access",
00006|     required: true,
00007|     instructions: "Go to [Alibaba Cloud Console](https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/) → Model Studio → Create API Key.\nCopy the generated API key that starts with 'sk-'.\nThis is required for translation functionality."
00008|   },
00009|   {
00010|     name: "DATABASE_URL",
00011|     description: "Neon PostgreSQL database connection string for Prisma operations",
00012|     required: true,
00013|     instructions: "Go to [Neon Console](https://console.neon.tech/) → Your Project → Dashboard → Connection Details.\nCopy the 'Database URL' connection string (postgresql://...).\nThis is required for user authentication and data persistence."
00014|   },
00015|   {
00016|     name: "DIRECT_URL",
00017|     description: "Neon direct database connection for migrations (optional but recommended)",
00018|     required: false,
00019|     instructions: "Go to [Neon Console](https://console.neon.tech/) → Your Project → Dashboard → Connection Details.\nCopy the 'Direct connection' URL if available.\nThis improves migration performance."
00020|   },
00021|   {
00022|     name: "NEXTAUTH_SECRET",
00023|     description: "NextAuth.js secret for JWT encryption and session security",
00024|     required: true,
00025|     instructions: "Generate a random secret key using: openssl rand -base64 32\nOr visit [generate-secret.vercel.app](https://generate-secret.vercel.app/32)\nThis secures user sessions and authentication tokens."
00026|   },
00027|   {
00028|     name: "NEXTAUTH_URL",
00029|     description: "Full URL where your Next.js app is deployed (for Auth.js callbacks)",
00030|     required: false,
00031|     instructions: "Set to your domain in production (e.g., https://yourdomain.com).\nFor development, this defaults to http://localhost:3000.\nRequired for OAuth providers and proper redirect handling."
00032|   },
00033|   {
00034|     name: "GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID",
00035|     description: "Google OAuth client ID for Google Sign-In integration",
00036|     required: false,
00037|     instructions: "Go to [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/) → APIs & Services → Credentials → Create OAuth 2.0 Client ID.\nSet authorized redirect URIs to: http://localhost:3000/api/auth/callback/google (dev) and https://yourdomain.com/api/auth/callback/google (prod).\nCopy the generated Client ID."
00038|   },
00039|   {
00040|     name: "GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
00041|     description: "Google OAuth client secret for Google Sign-In integration",
00042|     required: false,
00043|     instructions: "From the same Google Cloud Console OAuth 2.0 Client configuration.\nCopy the generated Client Secret.\nKeep this secret secure and never expose it publicly."
00044|   }
00045| ];
00046| 
00047| // SUPABASE/DATABASE VARIABLES (uncomment and add to ENV_VARIABLES array when adding database features)
00048| // {
00049| //   name: "DATABASE_URL",
00050| //   description: "Supabase PostgreSQL database connection string for migrations and server-side operations",
00051| //   required: true,
00052| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Database → Connection string (URI format).\n Copy the full postgresql:// connection string.\n Make sure to replace [YOUR-PASSWORD] with actual password"
00053| // },
00054| // {
00055| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL",
00056| //   description: "Supabase project URL for client-side authentication and API calls",
00057| //   required: true,
00058| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Data API → Copy the 'Project URL -> URL' field (format: https://[project-id].supabase.co)"
00059| // },
00060| // {
00061| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY",
00062| //   description: "Supabase anonymous/publishable key for client-side authentication",
00063| //   required: true,
00064| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → API Keys → Copy 'Legacy API keys → anon public' key"
00065| // }
00066| 
00067| export interface EnvVariable {
00068|   name: string
00069|   description: string
00070|   instructions: string
00071|   required: boolean
00072| }
00073| 
00074| export function checkMissingEnvVars(): string[] {
00075|   return ENV_VARIABLES.filter(envVar => envVar.required && !process.env[envVar.name]).map(envVar => envVar.name)
00076| }
</file>
state.title: lib/env-config.ts
